newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Karachi port handles 38,416 tonnes cargo.
newsitem.headline: Karachi port handles 38,416 tonnes cargo.

text.p: Pakistan's Karachi Port Trust said it had handled 38,416 tonnes of export and import cargo in the 24 hours to 7 a.m. (0200 GMT) on Monday, compared to 24,235 tonnes on Sunday.
In the past 24 hours, two ships sailed and five berthed. In the next 24 hours, five ships are expected to sail and five to arrive.
Berthing schedule of major vessels unloading or expected to unload at the Karachi Port:
High speed diesel 70,000 Chesa Peak City 5/8
